sentences: Richard Lee Jackson (born May 29, 1979) is an American drummer and actor.
Since 2004, he plays drums in American band Enation, of which his brother, Jonathan Jackson, the lead singer.

Jackson was born in Redlands, California, the son of Jeanine (Sharp), an amateur ventriloquist and businesswoman, and Dr. Rick "Ricky Lee" Jackson, a family physician, country musician and Congressional candidate in the state of Washington.
Jackson was raised in Battle Ground, Washington with his brother Jonathan Jackson, an actor and musician, and his sister Candice Jackson, a lawyer, author, and official in the Trump administration.
In 1993, he played Jason Lee Scott's cousin Jeremy in Mighty Morphin Power Rangers.
Richard married Raquel Torres on January 2, 2005.
